div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1930 Taranto environs, Calabria, c. 1937 Burial: c. 330 B.C. (K) Contents: 70+ AR Taras: st. (to Per. IV) Metapontum: st. Thurium: 60-70 dist. (incl. Noe A2, D2, D4, E2, F10, F22, F28) Velia: st. Croton: st. (worn) Terina: st. (worn) Disposition: dispersed Note in ANS No. 1919 above may be a part of this hd.
